main_title: Where Did the Roanoke Colony Disappear To?
hook: [mysterious] Get thisâ€”over 400 years ago, an entire colony vanished! In 1587, 117 English settlers on Roanoke Island left behind one cryptic clue: 'CROATOAN' carved into a tree.
description: The Roanoke Colony vanished without a trace, leaving only 'CROATOAN.' What really happened? #Roanoke #HistoryMystery #LostColonies
